arts.ttl: Jamie Lindsay scorcher earns Bristol Rovers victory over Shrewsbury
arts.sum: Under-fire boss Matt Taylor boosted by the win.

arts.ttl: Shrewsbury Town boss Paul Hurst supports straight talking Funso Ojo
arts.sum: I want the players to be accountable, we certainly hold them accountable, but you also have to understand the same people are perhaps going to be asked to go back on the football pitch and perform for you. The midfielder, who is on loan from Port Vale for the season, said at times the Salop players ‘need to be more direct with each other’ after their 2-0 defeat to Exeter City last Thursday.

Three of Bristol Rovers' four league victories this season have come at home and they could hardly ask for a better fixture if they want to pick up another three points at New Meadow. Shrewsbury trav...
